body_content.explanation: abbreviation for lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer (or questioning), intersex, and asexual (or ally): relating to or characteristic of people whose sexual orientation is not heterosexual (= sexually or romantically attracted to women if you are a man, and men if you are a woman) or whose gender identity is not cisgender (= having a gender that matches the physical body you were born with):
examples: LGBTQIA activists called for Congress to pass the anti-discrimination legislation immediately.
Many LGBTQIA students said that they did not feel safe on the college's campus.
The actor said that the film industry is long overdue in improving LGBTQIA representation in front of and behind the camera.
